title: What are the specifications of Realme 6i? - Quora

response.answer_text: Realme has now launched its entire series of Realme 6 smartphones and it won’t be an exaggeration to say that almost all its latest smartphones are targeted towards the gamers. First it gave Realme C3 with Mediatek Helio G70 processor and them came the Realme 6 and Realme 6 pro smartphones with Mediatek helio G90T and Snapdragon 730G processors. Continuing its streak of good gaming smartphones, Realme has came up with Realme 6i which again contains a Mediatek gaming processor. Realme 6i is powered by Mediatek Helio G80 processor which is octa-core in nature and is clocked at 2GHz. A thing to note here is that this is the first smartphone with this processor and is expected to hit the market in the budget segment. Besides this, the smartphone contains a 6.5-inch display with 720p display resolution. It also contains the latest Android 10 operating system and Mali-G52 MC2 as its GPU. As per the leaked specs, the smartphone is available in 3GB and 4GB RAM variants with 64GB and 128GB internal storage. The camera of the smartphone is good to. It contains a 48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP quad rear camera with an LED flash and a 16MP front camera as well. The smartphone is said to have 5000mAh of battery with 18W quick charging support and I think the features of this smartphone are good enough even at 12k. So if Realme decides to launch this smartphone within 10k, it would be a jackpot for the gamers and even the camera lovers. If you too are a budget buyer, I would ask you to wait for this smartphone or you can even got for Realme 6 which has a much better gaming power with mediatek Helio G90T processor.

Realme is a brand that is launching smartphones with promising features that keep up to the expectations of the customers. The Realme 6i is the latest launch of this brand that is priced at 12,999 for 4GB and 6GB RAM with 64GB internal storage that is expandable with microSD card. Realme 6i has 6.5 inches (16.51 cm) with Smooth 90Hz display and has a hole-punch design to accommodate the selfie camera. The display is good to be seen on a phone of 13,000. The phone runs Realme UI on top of Android 10 and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G90T octa-core processor. The highlight of this chip-set is that it is equipped with the latest HyperEngine Technology that is basically designed for gaming purposes and gives the phone a smooth experience while gaming. Heavy games are also smoothly played in this smartphone. The Realme 6i packs in a 4,300mAh battery which offers all-day battery life. It supports 30W quick charging facility. With a 20W flash charger, it takes 73 minutes to charge to 100%. There is a 20W Flash Charger & cable USB Type-C port in the box.  Coming to the camera specifications, the Realme 6i has a quad-camera setup at the back with a 48-megapixel primary camera, an 8-megapixel ultra-wide-angle camera, a 2-megapixel macro camera and a 2-megapixel depth sensor. The camera performance of the Realme 6i is good in daylight using the primary camera. Its wide-angle camera offered decent details. Lowlight camera performance wasn't as good as there is a bit of lagging in the performance. Some other features in the camera include Ultra 48MP Mode, Super NightScape, Panoramic view, Expert mode, Timelapse, Portrait mode, HDR, Ultra-wide mode, Ultra macro mode, AI scene recognition, AI Beauty, Filter, Chroma Boost, Slow Motion, and Bokeh Effect Control. The Realme 6i is available in two color variants- Lunar White and Eclipse Black. Connectivity options in the phone include Magnetic induction sensor, Light sensor, Proximity sensor, Gyro-meter, and Acceleration sensor. The Realme 6i is a smartphone that is affordable and has quite promising and impressive features to be found in 13,000 and among the best smartphones under 15,000 price range.
